typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_Asset_reference] STA\nLEFT OUTER JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID AND ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		IsProcessed as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\n	  ,[IsProcessed]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name,toInteger('0'))) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Version_name == Relation_Version_name,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name,IsProcessed)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_DatabaseName = DatabaseName,
		Relation_Group_ID = Group_ID,
		Relation_Attribute_id = Attribute_id,
		Relation_Origin_id = Origin_id,
		Relation_Asset_Offset = Asset_Offset,
		Relation_Version_name = Version_name,
		Relation_IsProcessed = IsProcessed,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		IsProcessed = toInteger('0')) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		IsProcessed = toInteger('0')) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		IsProcessed,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName = Relation_DatabaseName,
		Group_ID = Relation_Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Relation_Attribute_id,
		Origin_id = Relation_Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset = Relation_Asset_Offset,
		Version_name = Relation_Version_name,
		IsProcessed = Relation_IsProcessed,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		IsProcessed as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Version_name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		IsProcessed,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow
